text: [Applause]
we are honored to be joined today by the
family of Detective Myositis Familia
Detective Familia was a proud member of
the New York Police Department so I
promised I wouldn't tell you that she's
90 years old but you know what she is
really something right
you look like 55 maybe 55 huh oh yeah
I'll tell you what you got up those
stairs better than I did and when that
siren blares when the squad car races
down the street when the police officer
steps forth confident and proud and
strong so brave in that crisp blue
uniform we will think of you we will
think of your incredible daughter we
will be thinking of her we will be
thinking of all of the heroes we lost
and we will thank God for the men and
women of law enforcement
